abstract: Weapons in the passing game have never been more important. It's not just that potent wideouts produce big plays - it's that they also compel defenses to be conservative with their safeties.
snippet: Weapons in the passing game have never been more important. It's not just that potent wideouts produce big plays - it's that they also compel defenses to be conservative with their safeties.
lead_paragraph: Something that has really stood out on film this season is the significance of wide receivers. With the N.F.L. seemingly entirely pass-oriented these days - the four most productive weeks in league history in terms of passing yards have been Weeks 1, 2, 3 and 4 of the 2011 season - weapons in the passing game have never been more important.

headline.main: The Importance of a True No. 1 Receiver in the N.F.L.
